Job Posting:175165 - Position: W26 Software Engineer Intern - iOS, Poe (Remote) 175165B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/13/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/06/2025 01:10 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Quora Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description About Quora: 2026 - Winter W26 Software Engineer Intern - iOS, Poe (Remote) 175165B Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD 8033.0 per month for 0 Major List Quora's mission is to grow and share the world's knowledge. To do so, we have two knowledge sharing products: • Quora: a global knowledge sharing platform with over 400M monthly unique visitors, bringing people together to share insights on various topics and providing a unique platform to learn and connect with others. • Poe: a platform providing millions of global users with one place to chat, explore and build with a wide variety of AI language models (bots), including GPT-5, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Grok 4, Veo 3.1, Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana), and more. As AI capabilities rapidly advance, Poe provides a single platform to instantly integrate and utilize these new models. Behind these products are passionate, collaborative, and high-performing global teams. We have a culture rooted in transparency, idea-sharing, and experimentation that allows us to celebrate success and grow together through meaningful work. Join us on this journey to create a positive impact and make a significant change in the world. This role will be working on our Poe product. About the Team and Role: A Quora internship is not an ordinary internship. Every project our interns take on is impactful and tied to real company goals. As an iOS Engineer Intern on the Poe team, you'll help build one of the most exciting consumer AI products in the world. You'll work alongside experienced iOS engineers to design, develop, and polish features for the Poe iOS app - contributing directly to the product millions of people use daily to interact with cutting-edge AI models. You'll receive mentorship from full-time engineers, regular 1:1 feedback from your manager, and opportunities to collaborate with product managers, designers, and other technical teams. This is a chance to learn, grow, and make meaningful contributions to Poe's mobile experience. This internship will run for 16 weeks beginning in January. Responsibilities: • Collaborate with Poe's iOS engineers to design, build, and test new user-facing features • Contribute to the performance, stability, and polish of the Poe iOS app • Participate in code reviews and learn best practices in mobile architecture and product development • Work cross-functionally with design and product teams to create delightful user experiences Take ownership of a real project that will ship to users during your internship • Job Requirements Minimum Requirements: • Availability for meetings and impromptu communication during Quora's "coordination hours" (Mon-Fri: 9am-3pm Pacific Time) • • Currently pursuing a B.S., M.S., or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field at a Canadian University Graduating in Summer 2026 • Experience or coursework in Swift and a strong interest in iOS development • Strong problem-solving skills and an eagerness to learn • Passion for building impactful products and curiosity about AI Preferred Requirements: • Experience building or contributing to an iOS app (personal, academic, or professional) • Familiarity with SwiftUI, GraphQL, and app architecture patterns (MVC, MVVM, etc.) Interest in the intersection of AI and mobile applications • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Software Engineer Intern - iOS, Poe (Remote) @ Quora Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
